question:
Give the name of the league had the most goals in the 2016 season?
league that had the most goals refers to MAX(SUM(home_team_goal, away_team_goal)); 2016 season refers to season = '2015/2016';
query: SELECT t2.name FROM Match AS t1 INNER JOIN League AS t2 ON t1.league_id = t2.id WHERE t1.season = '2015/2016' GROUP BY t2.name ORDER BY SUM(t1.home_team_goal + t1.away_team_goal) DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 1
